roleset.name: store
roleset.note: STOCKPILE-V NOTES: Based on expansion of 'stock' frames. Member of Vncls keep-15.2. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from stockpile.01-v)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: The head of the nation 's largest car - dealers group is telling dealers to `` just say no '' when auto makers pressure them to stockpile cars on their lots .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: It includes stockpiling enough vaccine to protect twenty million people /.
example.arg: enough vaccine to protect twenty million people
